Name: Waifu Hunter - Secret of Pirates
About the game: Hayate is stranded from the future to another era when brutal and full of intrigues pirates are dominant. He accidentally meets a beautiful woman pirate named Carmen who brings a secret map which leads to an immortal treasure. Hayate will face a sly pirate captain, a tough commander, a mysterious necromancer and a wondeful creature mermaid. FEATURES : - Exciting storyline in visual novel style - 5 Waifu : Pirate, Pirate Captain, Commander, Necromancer and Mermaid - Cool pirate music theme - Match-3 with RPG elements
